title: Anyone ever heard of Arizona Dot Matrix
content: Have any of you guys ever heard of a font called Arizona Dot Matrix and if so do you have any idea where I can download it or find a sample at? Thanks
author: kflikt815

comments.content:
The only font I know of with the words “Dot Matrix” in its name is [FF Dot Matrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125085642/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories=1&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=dot+matrix).

- Lex

Check out dafont’s [LCD section](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125085642/http:/dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=302&page=1) if this is the style you’re looking for.

- Lex
